projects.name: Insectobot Tactics: A Strategic Multiplayer Game
projects.blurb: Insectobot Tactics is a simple multiplayer strategy game. Choose your insectobots, place them on the map, last one standing wins!

projects.name: Clandestine: Anomaly
projects.blurb: Clandestine: Anomaly - The next step in mobile gaming. The frontline is everywhere...

projects.name: CatLand —  turn your phone into an adorable companion
projects.blurb: The first ever location-aware virtual pet that lives on your smartphone and interacts with the real world

projects.name: Flight of the Data-Thief
projects.blurb: Fast-paced rail shooter where you escape pursuers across an alien world.

projects.name: EXISTENCE online - MMO RPG FPS PvP PvE , Sandbox,  Limitless
projects.blurb: Limitless potential, rebuild the world in your image, while others do the same.  Fight, use and defend the resources to do it!  MASSIVE

projects.name: The Edge of Darkness
projects.blurb: Fight to victory in the massive, historical battles of the Iraq and U.S. War and World War II.

projects.name: LantixPro's Bevar in the Wild
projects.blurb: Bevar has crashed his spaceship on the lost world known as "Earth", and with no way out, Bevar has to survive... IN THE WILD!

projects.name: Goob's Cube Adventure - A Puzzle Platformer
projects.blurb: After a legion of cubes invades his world and sends him through a portal to theirs, Goob must platform and puzzle his way back home.

projects.name: CDF Ghostship - Open world Sci-fi Shooter with 5 game modes
projects.blurb: CDF Ghostship is a huge first person/third person shooter and survival horror, with 5 huge game modes Ghostship offers lots of replay .

projects.name: WAVERYDER
projects.blurb: AAA speedboat racing and stunt game set in realworld places Venice, London, Paris, Niagara Falls, Lake Zurich, Goa, Egypt, Prague.

projects.name: ODDJOB: Exploration RPG in Real Time Everywhere
projects.blurb: ODDJOB is a Reality-RPG Story Driven Application for Apple and Android That Allows Players to Interact Personally and Digitally.

projects.name: Reja: The Card Game Board Game (PC)
projects.blurb: Reja is a free to play unique fantasy card game board game hybrid built for strategic online gameplay for up to four players.

projects.name: Mech Island
projects.blurb: Defend your island against swarms of enemy invasions during the first Universe War.  Will your base and Mechs remain standing?

projects.name: VIDEO POKER DELUXE - Play for fun!
projects.blurb: The idea was to create a fun new game without losing the appeal of classic videopoker, also focusing on simplicity and speed.Play4fun!

projects.name: TV-style Show on Next Generation Video Games
projects.blurb: We usher in the next-generation of games by providing you with a high quality, TV-style show on TV, cell phones, mobile devices and PC!

projects.name: The Great NES Reviews Project from HonestGamers
projects.blurb: Love the NES? How would you like a book with reviews for 100 great NES games, written by passionate retro gamers? Help make it happen!

projects.name: Intergalactic Expedition
projects.blurb: Adventure through this action-packed space exploration game with an educational twist and an almost helpful robot guide!

projects.name: Chaos Drift
projects.blurb: Chaos Drift is a RPG inspired by old school fan favorites like Final Fantasy.  It features an original, unforgettable storyline.

projects.name: Ancients of Fasaria: Celestias Angelica (Expanded version)
projects.blurb: Expanded version of Ancients of Fasaria (Fantasy-Sci fi single/multiplayer RPG) with more features and major updates.

projects.name: FRIEND WARS - Dizzlike: the game
projects.blurb: Dizzlike - Here you can do what you shouldn't! It's a free-to-play Facebook-RPG-browsergame (FB-app) with an unusual multiplayer part!
